segments.text: I see the boy on the stool, reaching for cookies like his life depends on it.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: That stool looks like it’s about to tip over any second, and he doesn’t even seem worried.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He’s got one hand in the jar and the other holding a plate, balancing like a little acrobat.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is just standing there, waiting for her share, completely trusting him not to fall.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can’t help but smile at how determined they both are to get those cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But seriously, that stool is a disaster waiting to happen, and the woman is completely unaware.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope they get what they want before it all comes crashing down.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is still drying dishes, clueless about the chaos behind her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if the kids even realize how dangerous this is, or if they just don’t care.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This whole scene is a mix of adorable and terrifying all at once.
segments.speaker: PAR
